by.bsu.kisel.dao

Interface IDAOGroup

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DAOJdbcGroup, DAOJpaGroup

    public interface IDAOGroup
    This interface describes the operations that DAO classes for Group will implement.
    Author:
    Anastasiya Kisel
